Option (C), a funeral starting at a nearby church, may not directly cause the weather to appear gloomy. Option (B), a warm front moving overhead, is the most likely cause for the gloomy weather. A warm front is a boundary between warm and cold air masses, and when a warm front approaches, it often brings clouds and precipitation. This can cause the sky to appear gloomy and overcast even in the middle of the day.
